mapper.sql: id, are_holidays_scheduled, point_of_time_id, follow_up_template_id, reminders_for_patients, Doctors_reminders, ahead, prolong
mapper.select:
select
id rid, are_holidays_scheduled, point_of_time_id, follow_up_template_id, reminders_for_patients, Doctors_reminders, ahead, prolong, outpatient_department, be_hospitalized, leave_hospital, `operation`, admission_to_icu, out_of_icu, our_hospital, undergraduate_department, `first`, `last`, this_visit, arbitrary_treatment, benchmart_events_id, filter_events_id, start_year, start_month, duration, days_ahead, start_day, interval_year, interval_month, interval_day from follow_up_rules r,point_of_time p,benchmark_events b,filter_events f where r.point_of_time_id =p.id and p.benchmark_events_id = b.id and p.filter_events_id = f.id;
mapper.insert:
insert into follow_up_rules
id,
are_holidays_scheduled,
point_of_time_id,
follow_up_template_id,
reminders_for_patients,
Doctors_reminders,
ahead,
prolong,

mapper.update:
update follow_up_rules
are_holidays_scheduled = #{areHolidaysScheduled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
point_of_time_id = #{pointOfTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
follow_up_template_id = #{followUpTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reminders_for_patients = #{remindersForPatients,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Doctors_reminders = #{doctorsReminders,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ahead = #{ahead,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prolong = #{prolong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update follow_up_rules set are_holidays_scheduled = #{areHolidaysScheduled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, point_of_time_id = #{pointOfTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, follow_up_template_id = #{followUpTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reminders_for_patients = #{remindersForPatients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Doctors_reminders = #{doctorsReminders,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ahead = #{ahead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prolong = #{prolong,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
